global_adjustment.applicability: All events with positive validation errors

Telebirr Launch.reason: Telebirr had broader ecosystem effects beyond mobile money

NFIS-II Strategy Launch.reason: National strategies have comprehensive, long-term effects

policy_events.reason: Policy effects are cumulative and systemic
policy_events.action: Increase all policy event impacts by category factor

ACC_OWNERSHIP.reason: Account ownership is influenced by multiple converging factors

ACC_MM_ACCOUNT.reason: Mobile money impacts are more immediate and measurable
ACC_MM_ACCOUNT.action: Keep current estimates, apply only event-specific adjustments

confidence_scoring.high_confidence: Events with validation data and low error (<2pp)
confidence_scoring.medium_confidence: Events adjusted based on comparable evidence
confidence_scoring.low_confidence: Events without validation data or high error (>3pp)
